attributes.additional_details: 2021 has not been an easy year at all and to expect students to sit mind-boggling exams with little compensation for missed education is obscene. Therefore, England should follow the example of both Scotland and Wales in cancelling exams for 2021.
attributes.background: The parliament should cancel exams and approve centre-assessed grades to ensure that students are not held back by the unfortunate circumstances of 2020.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
